summary.span: 表示 控件中的一个项。

span.span: Represents an item in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件是类似于，因为它显示的项的列表。The control is similar to a in that it displays a list of items. 主要区别在于控件提供了可以由用户查看不同的方式项数。The main difference is that the control provides a number of different ways items can be viewed by the user. 类定义外观、 行为和数据中显示的项与相关联控件。The class defines the appearance, behavior, and data associated with an item that is displayed in the control. 对象可以显示在一个四个不同的视图中的控件。 objects can be displayed in the control in one of four different views. 项可以显示为大或小图标或垂直列表中的小图标。Items can be displayed as large or small icons or as small icons in a vertical list. 项还可以包含与父项相关的信息的子项。Items can also have subitems that contain information that is related to the parent item. 第四个视图样式，详细信息视图，使您可以用于标识要显示在子项中的信息的列标题以网格显示该项及其子项。The fourth view style, details view, allows you to display the item and its subitems in a grid with column headers that can be used to identify the information being displayed in a subitem. 属性的大多数类提供了方法中的项的显示更改与之关联的控件。Most of the properties of the class provide ways to change the display of the item in the control it is associated with. ， ，并属性，您可以更改项的文本中的显示方式控件。The , , and properties allow you to change how the text of the item is displayed in the control. 属性可以指定要从加载的映像分配给控件 (通过设置或属性的)。The property allows you to specify the image to load from the that is assigned to the control (by setting the or properties of the ). 项可以显示复选框，以便从一种类似于中的用户获取项选择控件。Items can display check boxes in order to obtain item choices from the user in a way similar to a control. 可以使用属性以确定是否项被选中，或者，选中或清除该复选框，在运行时。You can use the property to determine if an item is checked, or to select or clear the check box at run time. 项可以显示任意数量的子项时关联的属性控件设置为和列定义中的控件。Items can display any number of subitems when the property of the associated control is set to and columns are defined in the of the control. 可以通过调用某个项添加子项方法的类。You can add subitems to an item by calling the method of the class. 属性可用于访问类和其成员。The property allows you to gain access to the class and its members. 属性和方法的一些类是特定于项的版本中的属性和方法控件。Some of the properties and methods of the class are item-specific versions of properties and methods in the control. 例如，方法是类似于版本的方法，但版本会影响仅当前项。For example, the method is similar to the version of the method, but the version affects only the current item. 类还提供了方法不是版本的方法。The class also provides methods that are not versions of methods. 方法将项的文本置于编辑模式以便用户可以更改项的文本 (时的属性控件设置为`true`)。The method places the item's text into edit mode so the user can change the item's text (when the property of the control is set to `true`). 方法，可创建的现有副本要重用在其他对象控件。The method allows you to create copies of existing objects to reuse in other controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 您需要将代码添加到和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用属性来更改显示项文本的背景的颜色。You can use the property to change the color displayed behind the item text. 可以使用此属性，如果你想要使用不同的前景色和背景颜色组合 (使用要设置的前景色属性) 来区分从另一个项。This property can be used if you want to use different background and foreground color combinations (using the property to set the foreground color) to differentiate one item from another. 例如，可以设置属性设置为标识验证失败或缺少子项信息的项目。For example, you could set the property to to identify items that have failed validation or are missing subitem information. 如果你想要为所有子项的项使用相同的背景色，设置属性设置为`true`。If you want to use the same background color for all subitems of an item, set the property to `true`. 这将导致的颜色和字体为项指定要用于所有子项的文本。This will cause the colors and fonts specified for the item to be used for all subitem text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性才有效才的属性包含的项的控件设置为`true`。This property is effective only if the property of the control that contains the item is set to `true`. 可以在运行时使用此方法来强制执行要在编辑模式下显示的项的文本。You can use this method at run time to force the item's text to display in edit mode. 例如，如果在验证用户，编辑的项文本和项的验证失败，则可以选择中的项控件并调用方法，以强制用户更改未通过验证的文本。For example, if you are validating the item text edited by the user, and an item fails validation, you could select the item in the control and call the method to force the user to change the text that failed validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于获取整个项的边框。You can use this method to obtain the bounding rectangle of an entire item. 如果你想要获取整个项的一部分的边界矩形，使用方法。If you want to obtain the bounding rectangle for a portion of the entire item, use the method. 类提供了位于控件内的方法，使你能够获取任何项的边框。The class provides a method that allows you to get the bounding rectangle of any item located within the control. 返回的边界矩形都使用客户端控件的坐标相对于包含它的当前可见区域的左上角。The returned bounding rectangle uses client control coordinates that are relative to the top-left corner of the currently visible area of the containing . 如果是可滚动和定位，以便不是可见，返回的坐标可以是负数。If the is scrollable and positioned so that the is not visible, the coordinates returned may be negative. 当属性的值为，边界矩形的宽度是包含的项不在该项目中的文本的宽度的列的宽度。When the property has a value of , the width of the bounding rectangle is the width of the column containing the item, not the width of the text in the item. 如果集合不包含任何列，则使用默认列宽度为 60 像素。If the collection does not contain any columns, the default column width of 60 pixels is used.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性很有用才的属性控件中包含的项设置为`true`。This property is useful only if the property of the control the item is contained in is set to `true`. 此属性可用于确定是否项已选中用户或通过代码在运行时。You can use this property to determine if the item has been checked by the user or through code at run time. 若要确定所有签入的项控件，可以使用属性。To determine all the items that are checked in a control, you can use the property. 若要执行操作时签项，可以创建的事件处理程序属性的控件。To take action when an item has been checked, you can create an event handler for the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 您需要将代码添加到和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为控件不具有直接编辑区域-只有项包含在可以编辑-中的项的文本将显示焦点标线时具有焦点。Because a control does not have directly editable areas - only items contained in the can be edited - the text of an item in the will display the focus reticle when the has focus. 通常情况下，最后选择的项在控件是具有焦点的项。Typically, the last selected item in the control is the item with focus. 尽管某一项可能显示焦点标线，但它实际上不一定是中的选定的项。Although an item may display the focus reticle, it might not actually be a selected item in the . 可以使用属性来确定是否该项当前是中的已设定焦点的项包含它的控件。You can use the property to determine if the item is currently the focused item in the control that contains it. 如果不与关联控件，此属性将返回`false`。If the is not associated with a control, this property will return `false`. 控件提供了属性，以允许您确定哪些中具有焦点。The control provides the property to allow you to determine which in the has the focus.

summary.span: 获取或设置该项所分配到的组。

span.span: Gets or sets the group to which the item is assigned.

value.span: 该项所分配到的 。

span.span: The to which the item is assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性用于设置项所属的组。Use this property to set the group to which an item belongs. 您可以将组设置构造函数，也可以使用此属性在运行时修改的组成员身份。You can also set the group in the constructor, or you can use this property to modify the group membership at run time. 如果此属性设置为`null`中的组并且集合，此项将显示在具有标头设置为"的默认组。If you set this property to `null` and there are groups in the collection, the item will appear in the default group, which has the header label "DefaultGroupSystem.Windows.Forms". 中不包含默认组集合，并且不能更改。The default group is not contained in the collection, and cannot be altered. 它是主要适用于调试以确保所有项已正确都添加到组。It is primarily useful in debugging to ensure that all items have been properly added to groups. > [!NOTE] > 组是仅适用于 Windows XP 和 Windows Server 2003 系列 ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)])。 groups are only available on Windows XP and the Windows Server 2003 family ([!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]). 有关更多信息，请参见 概述主题。For more information, see the overview topic. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了如何可以将组织的应用程序中使用属性子项中的值的详细信息视图的项。The following code example demonstrates how the property can be used in an application that organizes items by subitem value in the details view. 这种形式是分组的类似于在 Windows 资源管理器中使用的分组。This form of grouping is similar to the grouping used in Windows Explorer. 在示例中，组是动态创建的。In the example, the groups are created dynamically. 对于每个子项列中，为每个唯一子项值创建一个组。For each subitem column, one group is created for each unique subitem value. 父项列中，为每个唯一的首字母创建一个组。For the parent item column, one group is created for each unique initial letter. 为每个列创建的组存储在子项文本或首字母以及一个哈希表中。The groups created for each column are stored in a hash table along with the subitem text or initial letter. 单击列标题时，检索对应于该列的哈希表。When a column header is clicked, the hash table corresponding to that column is retrieved. 接下来，为该列的子项的文本值用作哈希表键以检索正确的组的每个项。Next, the subitem text values for that column are used as hash table keys to retrieve the correct group for each item. 项然后分配给组使用属性。The item is then assigned to the group using the property. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分属性。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the property. summary.span: 获取或设置指示是否选定了项的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the item is selected.

value.span: 如果选定了项，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the item is selected; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果的属性控件中包含的项设置为`true`，设置此属性的值将添加或从所选的项的集合中移除的项。If the property of the control the item is contained in is set to `true`, setting the value of this property adds or removes the item from the set of selected items. 如果属性设置为`false`，设置此属性可以自动选择的项的值取消选择任何其他项目中的控件。If the property is set to `false`, setting the value of this property to select an item automatically cancels the selection for any other items in the control. 若要确定是否选定的项，或者可以在运行时选择的项，可以使用此属性。You can use this property to determine if an item is selected or to select an item at run time. 您可以访问所有项目中所选控件中的使用属性。You can access all items that are selected in a control by using the property. > [!NOTE] > 显示所选仅当项控件有焦点。Items appear selected only when the control has focus. 若要以响应用户选择项目操作如按钮单击，一定要调用除了设置此属性的方法。To select items in response to a user action such as a button click, be sure to call the method in addition to setting this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和成员。The following code example demonstrates how to use the and members. 若要运行该示例，将下面的代码放在一个窗体，其中包含名为`ListView1`和一个位于底部的窗体，名为`Button1`。To run the example, place the following code in a form containing a named `ListView1` and a , located toward the bottom of the form, named `Button1`. 调用`InitializeListView`方法从窗体的构造函数或事件处理方法。Call the `InitializeListView` method from the form's constructor or event-handling method. summary.span: 获取或设置为该项显示的状态图像（指示项的状态的图像，例如，选中的复选框或已清除的复选框）的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the state image (an image such as a selected or cleared check box that indicates the state of the item) that is displayed for the item.

value.span: 中为该项显示的状态图像的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the state image in the that is displayed for the item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许您指定的索引分配给关联的属性控件，其中存储的项的左侧显示的状态图像。This property allows you to specify the index into the assigned to the property of the associated control, where the state images to display to the left of the item are stored. 通常情况下，状态图像是所选或已清除的复选框，或用于表示的图像选择或清除的项的状态。Typically, the state image is a selected or cleared check box or an image that is intended to represent selected or cleared states for the item. 如果为不指定任何值属性，控件显示默认选中或清除复选框时控件的属性设置为`true`。If no value is specified for the property, the control displays a default selected or cleared check box when the property of the control is set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 尽管中指定属性可以包含任意数量的图像和属性可以设置为任何值，等于或小于 14，仅在 0 和 1 的索引位置的图像显示为状态图像。Although the specified in the property can contain any number of images, and the property can be set to any value equal to or lower than 14, only the images at index positions 0 and 1 are displayed as state images.

exception.span: 为该属性指定的值小于 -1。

span.span: The value specified for this property is less than -1.
-or-

exception.span: 为该属性指定的值大于 14。

span.span: The value specified for this property is greater than 14.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用，可将子项添加、 删除子项，并获取子项的计数。Using the , you can add subitems, remove subitems, and obtain a count of subitems. 可以在集合中的子项中执行的任务的详细信息，请参阅类参考主题。For more information on the tasks that can be performed with the subitems in the collection, see the class reference topics. > [!NOTE] > 中的第一个子项是始终拥有子项的项。The first subitem in the is always the item that owns the subitems. 对执行操作时子项在集合中，请确保引用的索引位置 1 而不是 0，则对第一个子项进行更改。When performing operations on subitems in the collection, be sure to reference index position 1 instead of 0 to make changes to the first subitem. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将创建有三个控件指定的对象和三个为每个项指定的对象。The following code example creates a control with three objects specified and three objects specified for each item. 此示例还创建对象详细信息视图中显示子项。The example also creates objects to display the subitems in details view. 两个对象也会在代码示例中提供的映像对象。Two objects are also created in the code example to provide images for the objects. 这些对象添加到和属性。These objects are added to the and properties. 该示例使用以下属性在创建控件：The example uses the following properties in creating the control: - - - - - - - 您需要将代码添加到和调用构造函数或在窗体上的另一种方法中的示例中创建的方法。You need to add the code to a and call the method created in the example from the constructor or another method on the form. 该示例需要映像名为`MySmallImage1`， `MySmallImage2`， `MyLargeImage1`，和`MyLargeImage2`位于根目录下的驱动器 c。The example requires that images named `MySmallImage1`, `MySmallImage2`, `MyLargeImage1`, and `MyLargeImage2` are located in the root directory of drive C.
